about_the_game:
Wildwood: Graveyard Defense is a fast-paced, top-down wave defense game! You are a frog with a magical mushroom hat — defend your graveyard and survive the night.

About Me & The Game

Hi, I'm Alan and I'm so excited for you to play Wildwood! 

I'm a solo indie developer. I originally launched Wildwood on mobile in 2019. Since then the game has continuously evolved through new updates and content drops.

Now, I'm completely re-imagining Wildwood for desktop!

I'm expanding the original gameplay, adding new mechanics, new enemies, and an entirely new progression system. I'm also working on some end-game content for anyone who wants even more challenge.

Please wishlist, and stay tuned for more!

Cool Stuff:

  • 🧙 Brew Potions: Buff your base stats with temporary potions

  • 🔦 Collect Lanterns: Unlock new lanterns each with unique properties and effects

  • 📈 Upgrade Skills: Unlock permanent upgrades and abilities to customize your playstyle

  • ✨ Stylized Art: Explore spooky, whimsical environments and unlock new levels

  • 🎮 Play Your Way: Supports keyboard/mouse and controllers

The Highlights:

  • Fast-paced active combat with simple controls (not an auto-shooter)

  • A mix of casual fun, sometimes chaotic situations, and a little bit of strategy

  • End-game challenges and high-score leaderboards

  • Magical mushroom hat 🐸🍄🎩
